description: The catalog contains targets for the Virginia Ecoforecast Reservoir Analysis. The targets include insitu target data, inflow target data, and meteorology target data. We provide the code to access the targets as an asset.
title: Targets

table:columns.name: duration
table:columns.description: temporal duration of target (hourly = PT1H, daily = P1D, etc.); follows ISO 8601 duration convention

table:columns.name: depth_m
table:columns.description: depth (meters) in water column of observation

data.title: Insitu Targets Access
data.description:
This R code will return results for the relevant targets file.

### R

```{r}
# Use code below

 url <- https://renc.osn.xsede.org/bio230121-bucket01/vera4cast/targets/project_id=vera4cast/duration=P1D/daily-insitu-targets.csv.gz
targets <- readr::read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE)
```
